name: interview.toml
rawContent:
# Interview Answers
# ================================================
# LLM Instructions:
# 1. Read status.toml → get currentPhase
# 2. Find that phase section here
# 3. Ask questions where value = "" or [] (empty)
# 4. Write user's answers immediately
# 5. When phase complete → update status.toml
#
# Format: use arrays [] for lists, "" for text/enum
# See: rules/challenge.md for conditional questions
# ================================================

[meta]
projectName = ""
startedAt = ""
completedAt = ""

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Phase 0: Assessment
# Goal: determine profile (simple | medium | complex)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
[assessment]
projectType = ""          # web-app | mobile | api | landing | admin-panel
projectStage = ""         # idea | redesign | existing-mvp
dataComplexity = ""       # simple-crud | relational | complex
rolesCount = ""           # single | 2-3 | many
integrationsLevel = ""    # none | few-apis | many-services
platforms = ""            # single | multiplatform
platformList = []         # if multiplatform: ["customer-app", "admin-panel"]
appSides = ""             # if mobile: single | dual
appSidesList = []         # if dual: ["passenger", "driver"]
existingCodebase = false  # true if adding to existing project
techConstraints = []      # e.g. ["React only", "PostgreSQL required"]

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Phase 1: Discovery
# Goal: understand what we're building
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
[discovery]
# Core
problem = ""              # What problem does it solve?
audience = ""             # Who is the target audience?
coreValue = ""            # Core value proposition
keyFeatures = []          # Top 5 features: ["feature1", "feature2"]
# Scope
inScope = []              # Must be included in MVP
outOfScope = []           # Explicitly NOT in MVP
successMetrics = []       # How we measure success
# Technical
constraints = ""          # Technical constraints
existingSystems = []      # Systems to integrate (complex only)
compliance = []           # ["GDPR", "PCI-DSS"] (complex only)
scale = ""                # Expected scale (complex only)
stakeholders = ""         # Who are stakeholders (complex only)
# AI (if needed)
aiIntegration = false
aiProvider = ""           # openai | anthropic | google | custom
aiFeatures = []           # ["chat", "search", "generation"]

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Phase 2: Design
# Goal: visual and UX requirements
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
[design]
# Visual
approach = ""             # custom | ui-kit | hybrid
colorScheme = ""          # Color preferences or palette name
darkMode = false          # Support dark mode?
brandGuidelines = false   # Has brand guidelines?
uiReferences = []         # Reference products/links
# Layout
responsive = ""           # mobile-first | desktop-first
accessibilityTarget = ""  # none | wcag-aa | wcag-aaa
# Localization
primaryLanguage = ""      # en | ru | ar | he | etc.
additionalLanguages = []  # ["es", "de"] or []
rtlSupport = false        # auto-true if ar/he/fa/ur
prototypeLanguage = ""    # en | same-as-primary

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Phase 3: Access
# Goal: auth and permissions
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
[access]
# Auth
authModel = ""            # public | authenticated | mixed
publicParts = []          # if mixed: ["landing", "pricing", "docs"]
authMethods = []          # ["email"] | ["phone"] | ["email", "phone"]
phoneFormat = ""          # if phone: single-country | multi-country
socialAuth = []           # ["google", "facebook", "apple"] or []
# Roles
userTypes = []            # ["admin", "user", "guest"]
rolePermissions = ""      # What can each role do?
protectedPages = []       # Pages requiring auth
# Advanced (complex only)
roleHierarchy = ""        # Role inheritance
permissionGranularity = "" # page | feature | field
multiTenant = ""          # none | orgs | workspaces
guestFlows = ""           # Guest vs authenticated flows

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Phase 4: Data Model
# Goal: entities and relationships
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
[data]
# Core
mainEntities = []         # ["User", "Product", "Order"]
entityFields = ""         # Fields for each entity (structured text)
relationships = ""        # Relations between entities
# Validation (medium+)
requiredFields = ""       # Required vs optional
validationRules = ""      # Validation rules
# Features
filesAndMedia = ""        # none | images | docs | video | mixed
search = ""               # none | basic | fulltext
softDelete = false        # Soft delete needed?
importExport = ""         # none | csv | xlsx | api
# Advanced (complex only)
fieldPermissions = ""     # Field-level permissions
auditTrails = ""          # none | basic | detailed
dataLifecycle = ""        # Data lifecycle states
retentionPolicy = ""      # Data retention rules

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Phase 5: Features & Screens
# Goal: what users see and do
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
[features]
# Screens
screens = []              # ["Home", "Dashboard", "Profile", "Settings"]
navigationMap = ""        # Navigation structure (tabs/sidebar/menu)
primaryUserJourney = ""   # Main user flow
# Stories (medium+)
userStories = ""          # Use cases with user stories
errorHandling = ""        # Error handling approach
# States (complex only)
emptyStates = ""          # Empty state handling
loadingStates = ""        # Loading state handling
offlineBehavior = ""      # Offline behavior
# System
notifications = ""        # none | in-app | email | push | mixed
settingsPage = false      # Include settings/profile page?
analyticsEvents = []      # Events to track

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Phase 6: Modules (complex only)
# Goal: domain decomposition
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
[modules]
domains = []              # ["auth", "catalog", "orders", "payments"]
moduleBoundaries = ""     # Module boundaries
interfaces = ""           # Module interfaces
sharedComponents = []     # Shared across modules
